name: Hack it! (BigBuckBunny)
description:
Hack it!

A game by BigBuckBunny

I started this game two days ago and I really enjoyed making it!

How to Play:

Press the keys of your keyboard to get points, buy upgrades into the shop and reach 1B points to win!

Special thanks to Samuele Sciacca https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmJRy12e_qIPCnWnf6jk7DQ

Also, thanks to SviluppareGiochi

If you want to support me you can make a small donation, i'd really appreciate it! :D
